Room.Name: East Hildor Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling on East Hildor Lane, north of Toby's Seed Store.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the lane is the village green, and to the east are most of the homes in the village. The west side tends to be mostly shops and places of business. Phexton Village is very proud to be the retirement home of one of the best fighters in the land. Jerome's School for Fighters is just east of here.
